meta.title: Demonstrate understanding of mechanical systems
meta.purpose: This achievement standard involves demonstrating understanding of mechanical systems.

grade_descriptors.N1: Evidence does not reach the minimum threshold for Achieved-level indicators.
grade_descriptors.N2: Some Achieved-level indicators are met, but not enough to satisfy all required Achieved criteria.
grade_descriptors.A3: All Achieved-level indicators are met; no Merit-level indicator meets the Merit threshold.
grade_descriptors.A4: All Achieved indicators are met and at least one Merit indicator is met, but overall performance is below the Merit threshold.
grade_descriptors.M5: All Achieved indicators are met and the Merit threshold is reached; no Excellence-level indicator meets the Excellence threshold.
grade_descriptors.M6: All Achieved indicators are met, all Merit indicators are met, and at least one Excellence indicator is met, but overall performance is below the Excellence threshold.
grade_descriptors.E7: All Achieved and Merit indicators are met and the Excellence threshold is reached, but not all Excellence indicators are met.
grade_descriptors.E8: All Achieved, Merit, and Excellence indicators are met.

omis.description: Provides accurate definitions of core physical quantities such as force, torque, or angular velocity.
omis.detection_hint: The response must define physical quantities using correct terminology and directionality. Vague or circular definitions disqualify. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: centripetal force is directed toward the centre of the circle

omis.description: Draws a force diagram with all relevant forces in correct directions and locations.
omis.detection_hint: Diagrams must include and label all significant forces acting on the object. Incorrect direction or missing vectors disqualify. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.

omis.description: Correctly uses angular kinematic relationships to solve for unknowns.
omis.detection_hint: Equations like ω = θ/t or θ = ωt must be used with correct substitution. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: calculated angular velocity using rotational kinematics

omis.description: Identifies that net force arises from the sum of multiple interacting forces.
omis.detection_hint: Must clearly state that a net force results from unbalanced forces and describe direction. Merely listing forces is insufficient. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: recognised that the net force provided the centripetal force

omis.description: Applies conservation of energy reasoning across multiple energy forms.
omis.detection_hint: The student must state initial and final energy forms and equate them with reasoning. A single formula without linkage is insufficient. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: solved problems using the conservation of energy with mistake(s)

omis.description: Explains how mass distribution affects rotational inertia or acceleration.
omis.detection_hint: Must reference formulas (e.g., I ∝ mr²) or reasoning linking mass layout to motion outcome. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: explain why rotational inertia decreases using a valid formulae or relationship

omis.description: Identifies how energy is lost from a system and the physical mechanism responsible.
omis.detection_hint: Must link specific energy loss (e.g., to heat, sound) to cause (e.g., friction). General references to 'loss' are insufficient. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: energy is lost as heat due to friction during damping

omis.description: Compares relative force magnitudes or directions across different system conditions.
omis.detection_hint: The response must describe how net forces vary between positions, including direction and cause. Listing forces without comparison disqualifies. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: comprehensive discussion of the net force
relative net forces for different positions

omis.description: Uses physics equations and working to logically justify conclusions.
omis.detection_hint: Justification must follow a clear progression: known → formula → substitution → result → conclusion. Listing final answers only is insufficient. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: produced clear logical and sequential layout

omis.description: Analyses a system's energy transformation sequence and explains cause–effect impact.
omis.detection_hint: Must trace energy transitions and explain resulting motion or system change. General statements without linkage disqualify. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: reference to all energy transformations and cause and impact of loss
